name: Garchomp
description: The Mach Pokémon. When it folds up its body and extends its wings, it looks like a jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to Sandstorm damage. In addition, its AC increases by 2 in desert terrain, or during a Sandstorm.

abilities.name: Rough Skin
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit by a melee attack, it may roll a d4. On a 4, deal an amount of typeless damage equal to its proficiency modifier to its attacker.
